changed: Improve performance for Sonarr and Radarr workers
Swipearr for Sonarr should support list exclusion
Do not scan for unreleased episodes
Spotify to mediaserver checks if it is a Spotify generated playlist
It automatically searches again for not yet processed episodes

added: Music Video; Also downloads subtitles and create an NFO file
changed: Config file; Added a new option to download subtitles
Music video detection; The scene change detection is changed

added: Spotify to Mediaserver; A new worker that converts your playlists to audio and video playlists
Playlist to Music Video; A new worker that converts your playlists to music videos
Music Video; A new system which can download music videos from Youtube (check legal issues)
changed: DynaArr; Moved the settings page to settings

added: Debug logs, creating a file named DEBUG in the /data directory will enable debug logging
changed: Repo transferred to a different user
Fixed; Config file not saving correctly
Using a store for the webui

added: SwipeArr; Tv shows now display total episode and season count
removed: DynaArr; id, qualityProfileId, hasFile and monitored UI filters

added: DynaArr; Checks if Arr instances are busy searching
changed: Fixed; UI SwipeArr for devices with not enough height
Fixed; API endpoints for Emby and Jellyfin
Fixed; Media server info not saving

added: SwipeArr; A Tinder like interface to manage your libraries
DynaArr; An automated management system for Arr suite
Tool - Delete unmonitored; Delete all unmonitored files
